tr.td: • Increases EV-A71 translation and virulence in mice
• Associates with higher prevalence in severe cases of EV-A71

td.p: • Increases viral growth and fitness in human neuronal cells
• May facilitate CNS infection in humans
• Enhances replication, infectivity, and fitness in colorectal cells
• Confers advantage in viral binding ability and fitness in neuronal cells
• Potential determinant of host-adaptation and neurovirulence in humans
• Regulates EV-A71 maturation via the efficient cleavage of VP0 precursor
• Enhances binding of EV-A71 to mouse neuroblastoma
• Increases viral binding and RNA accumulation of EV-A71
• Cooperates with VP2 K149M to increase mouse lethality in vivo

tr.td: • Associates with increase in virulence in mice
• Associates with virus binding ability to PSGL-1
• Associates with higher prevalence in severe cases of EV-A71
• Key determinant of increased infectivity in human airway organoids
• Potential infectivity markers of human airway organoids
• Responsible for the development of viremia and neuropathogenesis, and increases levels of cytokines in Cynomolgus monkey model
• Associates with mouse adaptation and virulence

td.p: • Increases RNA accumulation, viral toxicity, virulence, and uncoating in mouse neuronal cells
• Cooperates with VP1 Q145E to increase infectivity and mouse lethality of EV-A71, and increases cytotoxicity in Neuro-2a cells

tr.td: • Associates with higher prevalence in severe cases of EV-A71
• Can hamper the host innate defense by selectively blocking type I IFN synthesis

td.p: • Decreases viral replication and virulence in RD cells
• Regulates 3C pro enzyme activity in mammalian cells
• Contributes to a strong temperature sensitivity
